He was best known for writing the best- selling How to Meditate (1974) a practical guide to meditation.Fields, Tracy. (1995). Cancer Patients Call On Mind To Help Heal The Body. Ocala Star-Banner. He wrote about 75 articles in the professional literature and thirteen books about psychotherapy, war, cancer treatment, and mysticism. LeShan was born in New York City.
